title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Introducing the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins, a perfect addition to your holiday decor and festivities. These 17 x 17 inch (43 x 43 cm) polyester napkins feature a smooth and glossy finish, making them an elegant choice for your table setting.

The design theme of these napkins is the Christmas Nativity scene, with gold embroidered texts that add a touch of luxury. The napkins are available in a beautiful shade of blue, with religious-themed text designs that include words such as 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', and 'Peace'. These napkins are not just stylish, but they also carry a symbolic meaning that makes them ideal for Christmas, religious, or festive occasions.

This set includes 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins, making it a perfect gift for family, friends, or fellow believers. The napkins are washable and reusable, ensuring they can be used for many Christmases to come. Please note that due to manual measurement, there might be slight errors in size, and the color might slightly differ due to screen display. The words on the napkins are not used as a trademark, only for expression.

Experience the joy and beauty of the Nativity scene with these Suclain Christmas Nativity Napkins. Order yours today and add a touch of elegance and religious significance to your holiday celebrations.
